name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart Address Bar - Split, Copy & GoTo

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple web extension to split current tab url, can copy the specific part of URL & more..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is simple extension helps you by splitting the current tab URL, you can copy, go to in new or exsisting tab.
